message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thanks for showing me the product. I'm interested but $120 seems a bit high. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand that $85 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss $110?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  How about we settle at $95? That feels like a fair compromise to me.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're willing to meet me at $95, but I'm not quite there yet. How about we try $105 again?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to work with me on the price. To be honest, $105 is a little too high for my budget. How about we split the difference and call it a deal at $100?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! But I still think the product is worth a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at $110?

Alice, I've enjoyed this negotiation, but I'm running out of time. I'm willing to pay $100 for this product. If that works for you, I'm ready to make the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to explore other options.
I understand you're running out of time, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $110. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at $110, I'll have to consider other options.
